name: Eslam Saad
headerTaglineTwo: I'm Eslam Saad – a professional designer and developer

projects.description: Gym is a fitness facility designed to improve physical health and strength through a variety of exercises and specialized equipment.

projects.title: Medic Care
projects.description: A medical clinic is a healthcare facility that provides diagnosis, treatment, and preventive care for various health conditions.

projects.title: Zay Shop
projects.description: A gym store is a retail shop that offers fitness equipment, workout gear, and supplements for health and exercise enthusiasts.

services.title: Web Application Development
services.description: Building responsive, secure, and scalable web applications using modern frontend and backend technologies. Developing complete solutions from user interface to server-side logic using tools like React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

services.title: API Design & Integration
services.description: Creating powerful RESTful and GraphQL APIs, and integrating third-party services seamlessly. Ensures smooth communication between frontend and backend, enhancing performance and user experience.

services.title: UI/UX Design & Optimization
services.description: Designing intuitive and user-friendly interfaces with a focus on usability and modern aesthetics. Combining creativity with functionality to deliver engaging digital experiences.

services.title: Database Management & Optimization
services.description: Designing and managing relational and non-relational databases with performance in mind. Skilled in SQL and NoSQL databases like MySQL and MongoDB, ensuring fast and reliable data access.

aboutpara: Experienced Full Stack Engineer with a proven track record in designing, developing, and maintaining robust web applications. Proficient in a wide range of programming languages and frameworks including JavaScript, React, Node.js, and Python. Skilled in both frontend and backend development, with a keen eye for scalable architecture and user-centric design. Excels in collaborative environments, adept at leading teams and delivering high-quality solutions that align with business objectives. Passionate about leveraging technology to solve complex problems and enhance user experiences.

resume.tagline: 👋  I'm a software engineer, product designer.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of a React application, Worked on the frontend of a React application
